Title: German photographer Nora Bibel turns the focus on Chala
Content: “I like people,” says photographer Nora Bibel, when we meet up with her ahead of World Photography Day today, at the Goethe-Zentrum Trivandrum, where she is an artist-in-residence. “People are special
Author: Nita Sathyendran
